name: COVID19ICD10CMValueSetForCarotidArteryStenosis
title: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Carotid Artery Stenosis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to carotid artery stenosis and is listed as a cardiovascular disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes carotid artery stenosis and complications due to carotid artery stenosis (e.g., Cerebral infarction due to stenosis of carotid artery).),(Exclusion Criteria: )
